title: Project Management - Budget Management
description: A project manager reviews the budget for an ongoing project and sees that it is at risk of going over budget.

tasks.description: Review all time entries and expenses logged against the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project manager identifies which tasks took longer than estimated.

tasks.description: Meet with the technical team to understand the reasons for the extra time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM learns about unforeseen technical challenges.

tasks.description: Proactively communicate the budget risk to the client and discuss options, such as de-scoping certain tasks to stay within budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM manages the client's expectations and collaborates on a solution.
